verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus breaks every fetter,
Jesus breaks every fetter,
Jesus breaks every fetter,
And He sets me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am now on the altar,
I am now on the altar,
I am now on the altar
Which was made for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will never doubt my Savior,
I will never doubt my Savior,
I will never doubt my Savior,
For He cleanses me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I will rest on His promise,
I will rest on His promise,
I will rest on His promise,
Which is given to me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I will shout Hallelujah!
I will shout Hallelujah!
I will shout Hallelujah!
For He sets me free.
